sen.j: 道忠（どうちゅう）は、奈良時代末期・平安時代初期の律宗の僧侶。
sen.e: Dochu was a Buddhist monk of Ritsu sect from the late Nara period to the early Heian period.
Dochu was a Buddhist monk of Ritsu sect from the late Nara period to the early Heian period.
Dochu was a Buddhist monk of Ritsu sect from the late Nara period to the early Heian period.

sen.j: 鑑真が唐から来日後、彼に師事して具足戒を受けて律宗を学んだ。
sen.e: After Ganjin (Jianzhen) came from China (Tang Dynasty) to Japan, Dochu was a disciple under him, abode to take the fulfillment admonitions, and studied about the Ritsu sect.
After Ganjin (Jianzhen) came from China (Tang Dynasty) to Japan, Dochu became a disciple of him, took the full precepts, and studied about the Ritsu sect.
sen.cmt: 用語統一に合わせました。動詞変更しました。
sen.e: After Ganjin (Jianzhen) came from China (Tang Dynasty) to Japan, Dochu became a disciple of him, took the full precepts, and studied about the Ritsu sect.

sen.j: 後に東国を回って教えを広め、慈光寺 (ときがわ町)を創建した。
sen.e: Afterward, Dochu wandered round the eastern provinces, spread the doctrine, built the Jiko-ji Temple (Tokigawa-machi Town).
Afterward, Dochu wandered round the eastern provinces to spread the doctrine, and built Jiko-ji Temple (Tokigawa-machi Town).

sen.j: 人々に菩薩戒を授けて回ったために、人々は彼を菩薩と呼んで尊んだ。
sen.e: Because he taught and spread around the Bodhisattva Precepts, people respected and called him a Bodhisattva.
Because he taught and spread around the Bodhisattva Precepts, people respected and called him Bodhisattva.

sen.j: 後に彼から菩薩戒を受けた円澄が最澄の門人となったことから両者の間に交流に生まれた。
sen.e: Because of the fact that, Encho, who later received Bodhisattva Precepts from him, was a disciple of Saicho, there became exchange between the two.

sen.j: 最澄が天台宗を広めるために広く経典の書写を呼びかけた際に仏法発展のために支援を行ったという。
sen.e: It is said that when Saicho was calling people for the transcription by handwriting of the Buddhist scriptures in an attempt to popularize Tendai-shu sect, he supported Ritsu sect in the development of Buddhism.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: It is said that when Saicho called people for transcriptions by handwriting of the Buddhist scriptures in an attempt to popularize Tendai sect, Dochu supported Saicho to develop Buddhism.

sen.j: なお、道忠が菩薩戒を授けたのは、師の鑑真が独占的に受戒を行うことへの反抗であるとする説がある。
sen.e: There was a theory assuming that Dochu's teaching of Bodhisattva Precepts was a rebellion to his master Ganjin (Jianzhen)'s exclusive teaching of the religious precepts.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.j: しかし、根拠のない俗説である。
sen.e: However, it was a groundless folklore.
